statements: SELECT * FROM AssetMaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT asset_name, maintenance_date FROM AssetMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AssetMaintenanceSchedule WHERE service_date >= '2022-01-01' AND service_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM AssetMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, maintenance_date, service_date FROM AssetMaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY asset_name ASC, maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, maintenance_date, service_date FROM AssetMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT asset_name, maintenance_date, service_date, asset_id FROM AssetMaintenanceSchedule WHERE asset_name LIKE '%pump%' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM AssetMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' AND service_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY service_date ASC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM AssetMaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND asset_name IN ('Generator', 'Compressor') ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT asset_name FROM AssetMaintenanceSchedule WHERE service_date < '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date FROM assets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM assets WHERE purchase_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE service_type = 'Oil Change' AND completed = FALSE;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, next_service_date FROM assets WHERE next_service_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date FROM assets WHERE purchase_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT asset_name, last_service_date FROM assets WHERE last_service_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE service_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date, last_service_date, next_service_date FROM assets JOIN maintenance_schedule ON assets.asset_id = maintenance_schedule.asset_id WHERE completed = FALSE;
SELECT asset_name, next_service_date FROM assets WHERE next_service_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM asset;
SELECT asset_name, last_service_date, next_service_date FROM asset;
SELECT description FROM asset WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE service_type = 'Regular Maintenance';
SELECT technician_name, specialization FROM technician;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, last_service_date, next_service_date, description FROM asset WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, asset_id, service_date, service_type, technician_id, completion_status FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT * FROM technician WHERE specialization IN ('Electrical', 'Plumbing') ORDER BY technician_name ASC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, last_service_date, next_service_date, description FROM asset WHERE last_service_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_service_date DESC;

SELECT technician_name, specialization, COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_schedules FROM technician INNER JOIN maintenance_schedule ON technician.technician_id = maintenance_schedule.technician_id GROUP BY technician_name, specialization;
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, last_service_date FROM assets WHERE maintenance_schedule < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT asset_name, maintenance_schedule FROM assets ORDER BY maintenance_schedule DESC;
SELECT technician_name, certification_level FROM technicians WHERE hire_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, last_service_date FROM assets WHERE maintenance_schedule < '2022-01-01';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, maintenance_schedule, last_service_date FROM assets WHERE maintenance_schedule IS NOT NULL;
SELECT task_description, task_due_date FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE completed = false ORDER BY task_due_date ASC;

SELECT asset_name, maintenance_schedule, audit_date, audit_notes FROM assets JOIN maintenance_tasks ON assets.asset_id = maintenance_tasks.asset_id JOIN audits ON maintenance_tasks.task_id = audits.task_id WHERE certification_level > 2 ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assets
SELECT asset_name, purchase_date FROM assets WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT asset_name, service_due_date FROM assets ORDER BY service_due_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_assets FROM assets
SELECT task_description, task_frequency FROM maintenance_tasks
SELECT * FROM assets ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, asset_id;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM assets WHERE service_due_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_description, task_frequency FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_frequency > '1 month'::interval;

SELECT asset_name, purchase_date, service_due_date FROM assets INNER JOIN asset_maintenance ON assets.asset_id = asset_maintenance.asset_id INNER JOIN assigned_tasks ON asset_maintenance.maintenance_id = assigned_tasks.maintenance_id WHERE assigned_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT personnel_name, specialty FROM maintenance_personnel ORDER BY personnel_id;
